text: @realDonaldTrump The stock market us so disconnected from reality it's not funny.  But yeah, I guess the millions of people sick from covid19, the 107k dead, the complete dissolution of cities across the nation, the huge numbers of dead POC, thev40 million unemployed are zero to #PresidentPlump
